tool_description: Manages incoming volunteer applications across platforms with automated responses, screening, and organization features.

listing_id.description: ID of the volunteer listing to manage applications for

auto_acknowledge.description: Whether to automatically send acknowledgment emails to applicants

response_template.description: Template for automated responses to applicants

priority_keywords.description: Keywords that flag applications for priority review

error_messages: Invalid listing ID: The provided listing_id does not exist or has no active applications.
Template parsing error: The response_template contains invalid formatting or merge fields.
Email delivery failed: Unable to send automated responses due to email service issues.
Screening criteria error: One or more screening criteria are invalid or cannot be processed.
Application access denied: Insufficient permissions to access applications from one or more platforms.
usage: Provide listing_id to manage applications. Configure auto_acknowledge, screening_criteria, and response templates for automated processing.

new_applications.description: Number of new applications since last check

priority_applications.description: Number of applications flagged for priority review

application_summary.description: Summary of application statuses and next actions
